name: Extreme Super Car Driving 1
description:
Extreme Street Auto Car Driving Simulator is the best car simulator of 2016, thanks to its advanced real physics engine
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Shatter the glass,Drift Simulator, do tricks, Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free! Go to auto and SUV drive. You must overcome hardships and hill climb.
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!Grand Street auto Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city!

GAME FEATURES
------------------------------------------
Drive with traffic !!!!!
Hill Climp
Drift Simulator
Racing Car Driving Simulator
Full real HUD including revs, gear and speed.
Explore a detailed open world environment.
Realistic car damage. Crash your car!
Accurate physics.
Control your car with a steering wheel, accelerometer or arrows
Several different cameras.

* Do extreme stunts
* Easy controller
* Realistic acceleration
* Grand Street
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
